code: import axiosClient from'./axiosClient';var ProductAPI={getAPI:function getAPI(){var url='/products';return axiosClient.get(url);},getCategory:function getCategory(query){var url="/products/category".concat(query);return axiosClient.get(url);},getDetail:function getDetail(id){var url="/products/".concat(id);return axiosClient.get(url);},getPagination:function getPagination(query){var url="/products/pagination".concat(query);return axiosClient.get(url);}};export default ProductAPI;
